ItemTooltips.bottle: Get bottle if you find yourself lacking regen early game. Not a usual pickup though.
ItemTooltips.ward_sentry: Buy sentries when you suspect the enemy team to buy them against you.
ItemTooltips.power_treads: I like Treads better than Phase Boots for the health boost and attack speed boost. I find having no trouble chasing with Jinada and Track to need Phase.
ItemTooltips.poor_mans_shield: Good early game item. Some damage, attack speed and a damage reduction from autoattacks.
ItemTooltips.vladmir: A great item for Gondar as well as the team. Gives you everything you need, mana regen, armor, damage, lifesteal.
ItemTooltips.orchid: Get this item to assassinate THAT mage that keeps stunning and killing your team.
ItemTooltips.assault: Armor and attack speed for you and your teammates, armor reduction for the enemies. What's not to love?
ItemTooltips.black_king_bar: Get this if their team team has lots of stuns. Also gives some damage and hp. Good item overall.
ItemTooltips.monkey_king_bar: A must have if the enemy carry has a Butterfly (counters the dodge chance).
ItemTooltips.butterfly: The ultimate carry item. Don't get this if the enemy has a Monkey King Bar.
ItemTooltips.desolator: Good damage item, nice armor shredding. I get this item often.
ItemTooltips.ancient_janggo: Get this if you have a bad early game and are having trouble farming for the bigger items.
ItemTooltips.abyssal_blade: Damage, bash chance and a great two second stun that goes throuch magic immunity. Get only if fairly fed though.
ItemTooltips.heavens_halberd: Nice tanky stats, great counter against their damage carry (Disarm prevents them from attacking)

AbilityTooltips.bounty_hunter_shuriken_toss: Good damage early game, great for killing running heroes and canceling TPs. Best maxed early.
AbilityTooltips.bounty_hunter_jinada: Get a level before 6 for the slow and better last hitting, max after Shuriken.
AbilityTooltips.bounty_hunter_wind_walk: Get two levels before 6, so the duration is longer than the cooldown.
AbilityTooltips.bounty_hunter_track: One of the best ultimates in the game. Make sure to use it every fight for the extra gold. Useful when chasing and running away because of the speed boost.
